title: Advance Movies/Events/Sports/Play booking on BookMyShow : BookMyShow Support Centre
body:
When does the booking show up on BookMyShow for upcoming Movies/Events/Play/Sports?
Once bookings go live, you can grab your desired tickets and enjoy the show.
In case you still don't see your desired movie/event/sport/play available for the booking, chances are, that it is yet to go live.
Stay in touch with our website/mobile application for updates.
